job_title: Unit Clerk in The Pas, MB
pros:
- some great people to work with
- pay is good before taxes and deductions
- really enjoyed the job 
- good hours
cons:
- management was iffy, only around when things got bad and didn't really feel supportive
- deductions felt overwhelming when you have to pay healthcare for partner and dependants
- no opportunity to get more sick time, unrealistic sick time with children, especially during covid.
